price: Anaye geuza shingo yake ili kupoteza watu waache Njia ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Duniani atapata hizaya, na Siku ya Kiyama tutamwonjesha adhabu ya kuungua.
arabic: ثَانِيَ عِطۡفِهِۦ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ لَهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا خِزۡيٞۖ وَنُذِيقُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَذَابَ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
footnotes: Na pamoja na hayo hugeuka upande kwa kiburi na kukataa kuikubali Haki. Na watu wa namna hii itakuja wapata hizaya na udhalili duniani kwa ushindi wa Neno la Haki, na Siku ya Kiyama Mwenyezi Mungu atawaadhibu kwa Moto wa kuunguza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thāniya ʿiṭ'fihi liyuḍilla ʿan sabīli al-lahi lahu fī al-dun'yā khiz'yun wanudhīquhu yawma al-qiyāmati ʿadhāba al-ḥarīqi
translations: and We will make him taste
